subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Kyle Busch followed his win in the Truck Series on Friday night at the Phoenix International Raceway with a victory yesterday in the Busch Series. If he wins the Nextel Cup event today, he will become the first driver to sweep all three of Nascar’s national series at the same track on the same weekend.
